dataList.title: Лев, Волчица и Пантера
dataList.desc: In a black, dusky forest, I lost the way.

dataList.title: Знакомство
dataList.desc: When I awoke, I was on a peculiar bus. The man who introduced himself as “Vergilius” showed me to the twelve Sinners I’ll be overseeing as their new manager…

dataList.title: Педаль в пол
dataList.desc: I’m starting to get used to fighting alongside these Sinners. Though, whether they’re used to my presence is another story…

dataList.title: Возможности
dataList.desc: Various possibilities emerged from the Mirror. Faust says it’s my job to take care of them. Just who was I in the past, and how did I get myself roped into this…?
